newsitem.title: USA: Autodesk sweetens bid for Softedesk.
newsitem.headline: Autodesk sweetens bid for Softedesk.

text.p: Autodesk Inc and Softdesk Inc said Friday they had amended their definitive merger agreement, sweetening Autodesk's bid for Softdesk to $15 a share from $12.
The $15 will be paid in Autodesk common stock based on the average closing prices on the Nasdaq for the five trading days preceding the closing date, the companies said.
The merger, to be accounted for as a pooling of interests, was amended because Softdesk said a third party was interested in it.
"We have increased the purchase price principally in response to an indication of interest received by Softdesk from a third party," said Carol Bartz, Autodesk chairman and chief executive.
Dave Arnold, the chief executive of Sofdesk, said the company was committed to the Autodesk merger.
